title: Rahu Transit in the 4th House: Restless Home and Shifting Roots
summary: When Rahu transits the 4th house for a Capricorn Ascendant, inner security, home life, and emotional grounding feel unsettled. A strong desire for change in residence, lifestyle, or property emerges, often driven by dissatisfaction with the past. Domestic peace may fluctuate, and relationships with mother figures require patience. This transit favors unconventional living setups and property experiments, but lasting comfort comes only when emotional stability is rebuilt through clarity, balance, and conscious detachment from old patterns.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Attachment to comfort mixed with anxiety

sections.title: Career
points: Interest in real estate or vehicles
Need to balance home and ambition

sections.title: Relationships
points: Distance or confusion with mother figures

sections.title: Finance
points: Sudden expenses on home or property
Risk in speculative real estate moves

closing: Rahu in the 4th house teaches that true security is built internally, not by constantly changing the outer environment.
